mapper.select:
SELECT TLM.MEMBER_SEQ ,TLM.MEMBER_ID ,TLM.PASSWORD ,TLM.COM_CODE ,FN_COM_CODE(TLM.COM_CODE) AS COM_CODE_NM ,TLM.MEMBER_NAME ,TLM.EMAIL ,FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.EXTENSION_NO) AS EXTENSION_NO ,FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.MOBILE_NO) AS MOBILE_NO ,TLM.DEPT_NM ,TLM.POSITION_NM ,TO_DATE(TLM.JOIN_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') AS JOIN_DT ,TLM.ROLE_NAME ,TLM.TERMS_YN ,TLM.TERMS_DATE ,TLM.APPR_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('MEM001',TLM.APPR_STAT) AS APPR_STAT_NM ,TLM.FILE_SEQ ,TLM.FAIL_CNT ,TLM.CRE_YN ,TLM.DROP_YN ,TLM.UPD_SEQ ,TLM.UPD_TIMESTAMP ,TLM.MSG FROM TB_LC_MEMBERS TLM
AND MEMBER_SEQ = #{memberSeq}

SELECT
TLC.COM_CODE ,TLC.COM_NAME ,TO_CHAR(TLC.REG_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_TIMESTAMP FROM TB_LC_COMPANY TLC
AND TLC.COM_CODE != 3000001
AND TLC.COM_CODE = #{comCode}
AND TLC.COM_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{comName}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_LC_COMPANY ( COM_CODE /*회원사코드*/ ,COM_NAME /*회원사(상호명)*/ ,REG_TIMESTAMP /*등록일시*/ ,REG_SEQ /*등록자 시퀀스*/ ) VALUES ( #{comCode} /*회원사코드*/ ,#{comName} /*회원사(상호명)*/ ,NOW() /*등록일시*/ ,#{regSeq} /*등록자 시퀀스*/ )
